brand.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a type of product made by a particular company, that has a particular name or design
brand.translation[0].definitions[0].note: own brand British English,  store brand American English (=a product made and sold by a particular store)
brand.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: products which lack a strong brand image
What brand of detergent do you use?
brand.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a mark made or burned on a farm animal’s skin that shows who it belongs to
brand.translation[0].note_box[0].section: a leading brand such as Toshiba
Kids want to have Nike and Reebok and other top brands.
It’s the most popular brand of tequila in Mexico.
A supermarket’s own brand should cost less than the nationally advertised brands.
Schwartz is the brand leader for herbs and spices in the UK.
The use of tobacco brand names in sponsoring sports has been banned.
A company carefully protects its brand image.
Advertising is used to sell a product and create brand loyalty.
brand.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to describe someone or something as a very bad type of person or thing, often unfairly
brand.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Stealing that money has branded Jim for life – no one will trust him again.
You can’t brand all football supporters as hooligans.
brand.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to burn a mark onto something, especially a farm animal, in order to show who it belongs to
brand.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: Each cow was branded with the ranch’s logo.
brand.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: to give a name to a product or group of products so that they can be easily recognized by their name or design
brand.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: a name given to a product by a company so that the product can easily be recognized by its name or its design
brand.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: Virgin’s aim is to ensure that all its products and services match and exploit the brand.
This is a company with strong brands and a good position in many markets.
We built the Veuve Clicquot brand slowly over seven years.
Argos bought five factories and developed its own brand called Fortuna.
brand.translation[3].definitions[0].defi: to give a name to a product or group of products so that they can be easily recognized by their name or design
brand.translation[3].definitions[0].exam: We have made great efforts to brand our books by putting the company’s name on the front and back covers.
